function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Association between the number of trains and the spread of COVID-19","Impact":"Potential facilitation of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing strict sanitation measures and reducing overcrowding","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems and air filtration technologies","People":"Railway passengers and staff","Owner":"Transport authorities"},{"Description":"Impact of population flow on COVID-19 spread","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission in areas with higher population flow","Mitigation":"Public health campaigns, testing, and targeted interventions in high-flow areas","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps and monitoring systems","People":"Residents and visitors in high-flow areas","Owner":"Local health authorities"},{"Description":"Effect of aging population percentage on COVID-19 spread","Impact":"Potential vulnerability to severe disease outcomes in elderly populations","Mitigation":"Vaccination programs and protective measures for elderly communities","Technologies":"Telemedicine and remote health monitoring","People":"Elderly population and caregivers","Owner":"Healthcare providers"}]}
